sources.title: The Lyin' Lion (1949)
sources.description: Looey the Lion is tossed out of the circus for ruining an act in progress. He  works hard and devises himself a high-wire bicycle act, sneaks back into the  circus, has many mishaps while performing his, and is thrown out again. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-lyin-lion-1949/

metadata.Plot: Looey the Lion is tossed out of the circus for ruining an act in progress. He works hard and devises himself a high-wire bicycle act, sneaks back into the circus, has many mishaps while performing his, and is thrown out again.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Tom Morrison, Paul Terry
metadata.Actors: Dayton Allen, Tom Morrison, Sid Raymond
